name: Tandem Jumper
description:
Tandem Jumper

A and D to move Left and Right

W to climb (when near a wall). The arrow keys work too.

Space to jump. You can double jump!

Each alien has their own stamina.
Jump between walls frequently.

Climb fast! Lava is coming.

Web version takes a second to load, be patient!

The game also has some performance issues, especially the web version. Sorry about that :/

Music and SFX by Jonathan Gibson. Programming by Riley Miller.

Art courtesy of the inestimable Kenny: https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-art-complete-pack-often-updated
